alert.note: Alert for Dewey (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 2:16AM CST until February 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 to 8 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, a mix of sleet and snow expected. Total accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Dewey County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions call 8 4 4 4 6 5 4 9 9 7.
